name: louison-masseuse-energiticienne
description: Site web de Louison Masseuse Energiticienne revendiquand les services et les produits mis en place et reservable par contact avec Louison

scripts.resetDB: DEBUG=* sqitch revert; sqitch deploy; sqitch verify
scripts.initDbBastien: DEBUG=* psql -d mydillconnect -U postgres -f ./data/deploy/createTable.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U postgres -f ./data/deploy/createTrigger.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U postgres -f ./data/deploy/createData.sql;
scripts.initDb: DEBUG=* psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/deploy/createTable.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/deploy/createTrigger.sql;
scripts.PqslResetDB: DEBUG=* psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/revert/createTable.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/revert/createTrigger.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/deploy/createTable.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/deploy/createTrigger.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/verify/createTable.sql; psql -d mydillconnect -U Tim -f ./data/verify/createTrigger.sql;
